name: 李穎玟
objective:
透過課程訓練、實戰演練，以及組隊創業進行，從市場需求、商業模式規劃、量化問卷、價格與行銷等創業必修課讓學生了解創業老闆的真實樣貌，有效地訓練學生成為有機會在市場上生存的創業老闆。
Through course training, practical exercises, and team entrepreneurship, students are exposed to essential entrepreneurial subjects such as market demand analysis, business model planning, quantitative surveys, pricing, and marketing. These components provide students with insights into the realities of entrepreneurship, effectively equipping them with the skills needed to potentially thrive as entrepreneurs in the market.
